name: Domestic Reverse Osmosis System
description: The Domestic Reverse Osmosis System is manufactured by G1 Aqua under the Minral+ model name. Domestic homes are where this product is primarily used. This domestic reverse osmosis system is available in blue and has a 7.1 L to 14 L capacity. Reverse osmosis technology is used in this domestic reverse osmosis system. With the aid of skilled staff, we are capable of providing a wide range of domestic reverse osmosis systems.

name: G1 Aqua Commercial
description: G1 Aqua is the manufacturer of this G1 Aqua Commercial, which has the model number 50 LPH. This RO's daily capacity is 400 liters, and it uses reverse osmosis for water purification. We are engaged in offering a premium quality range of Industrial Commercial RO Water Purifier thanks to our substantial expertise in this field. The offered range is manufactured using high-grade raw material and advanced technology in compliance with the set industry standards. Our offered range is widely appreciated by our clients for its features like high performance, low maintenance, and longer service life.

name: Domestic RO Membrane
description: G1 Aqua produces the Domestic RO Membrane under the 75 GPD model designation. This product is typically used in drinking water RO systems. consists of TFC and has a 2" diameter. It is available in white. A partly permeable membrane is used in the reverse osmosis (RO) method of water purification to get rid of bigger particles, undesirable compounds, and ions from drinking water. As a result, the pure solvent is let to cross to the other side of the membrane while the solute is kept on the pressured side.

name: UV Chamber
description: In the RO water purifier, a UV chamber is used. This item makes use of UV technology. UV Chamber uses ultraviolet germicidal irradiation to operate. The UV-C used for this form of disinfection has a wavelength range of 200 to 280 nm. Microorganisms like bacteria, viruses, fungus, and other microbes can be killed by the electromagnetic energy that UV light produces. We have the most affordable prices for this product.

name: Cruze Gold Water Pump 100 GPD
description: Domestic RO is the primary use for this Cruze Gold Water Pump 100 GPD. This device has a 100 GPD capacity and a single pump booster pump. The booster pump for reverse osmosis is used to raise the water pressure entering the RO unit. Pressure drives the process of reverse osmosis. The pump itself is the big thing. Due to its 100 gallon per day pumping capacity, this device is a great option for large commercial enterprises or houses with numerous occupants.

name: Pre Filter Housing
description: Pre Filter Housing, which is typically used in water filters, is available in white and measures 10". You can insert this pre filter housing unit in any RO or UV water purifier. Before going through a second filter in your water purifier, your tap water would first go through a pre-filter.
